content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Emilia. I appreciate your time. I'm looking for a fair rental price that will maximize my gains as a landlord. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest possible price. I think we can come to an agreement on the rental price. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Emilia. While I understand your desire for a lower rental price, I am looking for a fair rental price that will maximize my gains as a landlord. My proposed rental price is €1,200 per month. Is this within your budget and acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of €1,200 per month. Thank you for your consideration. I would like to move in as soon as possible.

I understand that I am responsible for paying the rent on time and maintaining the apartment in good condition. I also understand that I should not make any changes to the apartment without your consent.

I would like to move in on the 1st of next month. Can you confirm the move-in date?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your prompt response, Emilia. I'm glad to hear that you agree to the rental price of €1,200 per month. Yes, the move-in date for your new tenancy is the 1st of next month. I will send you a formal tenancy agreement for you to review and sign, and we can arrange for a move-in inspection on the day you move in. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
